The municipality had a population of 44,886 in 2010, and covers an area of {{convert|25.10|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}} of which {{convert|1.35|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}} is covered by water. The municipality of Ridderkerk also includes the following towns, villages and townships: [[Bolnes]], [[Oostendam]], [[Rijsoord]] and [[Slikkerveer]]. ==Public transport== *Fast [[Ferry]]: **[[Rotterdam]] Willemskade - [[Krimpen aan den IJssel]] Stormpolder - Ridderkerk De Schans - [[Alblasserdam]] Kade - [[Dordrecht]] Merwekade.
